locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … Regional trucker (home weekly), and this TA is a great place to take a break. Nice clean, convenient shower facilities, and all the little nicknacks you usually need to grab during your downtime. The staff is friendly and courteous as well.
Nice Big Quiet But Only A Few Good Maintenance Personnel. So Shower's Can Be Slow/Backed Up Certain Times. They Have Security

If you are a professional driver and you are looking for a hot shower after a long day don't expect one at this TA, just like 90% of their facilities low water pressure and lukewarm water with fluctuations in temperature.

I took a shower at this location and I had a good experience and was pretty clean white guy with white shirt keeps floor and showers/restrooms pretty clean and does an awesome job also his willing to help you if you don’t know how to type …

So me and my husband come in to shower before we head out well my husband accidentally left his wallet in the shower room well we noticed it missing after we left I called and they said they have it we go back to get it just to find out …

Good Shower, water pressure reminded me of Rambo in the Jail clean up scene.
" Will said Clean him up, so clean him up, don't forget to get him behind the ears...ha ha ha ha ha..."
Family Friendly People
oxox

All is great from the service tech Andrew to Elise the waitress and the counter and shower girls. Andrew took care of my truck issue's in a timely manner and listened to my concerns. He did a job well done. Elise was very friendly and …

… clean and free of the plastic yellow land mines. Restrooms were clean and didn't have that dirty driver smell like so many do. Shower # 5 was clean with plenty of hot water that never ran out. Shower #7 was clean too with the same quality …

Good place.. I have running dedicated around this area for a month and never a wait for shower. Clean and restaurant is always ready to serve. Drop trailers can be irritating to some but the area dictates how the stop is used.  No …

Mostly ok... Only complaint I have is for the high price of a shower I'd think I could have had clean towels to dry off with. Mine was full of someone's hair knotted in it. Bathroom was mostly clean but could improve.

showerReviews.reviewText: I walked into the porta potty, and I was appalled by the unclenliness of it. Below are photos of what it looked like when i walked in. Smelled like sewage and ammonia. It can't cost that much to have the porta potty cleaned. Utterly disgusting!

Great place to get fuel and some hot food. Staff are amazing. One unisex bathroom, repair shop behind called Bayshore, no showers but it's all good. Typical mom-and-pop stop. Parking available (no reserve) and free as long as you stay in your truck. ATM available.

It is a little mom and pop truck stop so it does close at 6 pm est but they have a port a potty for people to use the bathroom overnight and you can use fuel cards at the pumps. It has one bathroom inside as well during business hours. …
Not good food and not clean there were hair in my salad so i had to refund
No washroom... just the ugly blue/ boxes...

… I am living so close :) Wish to have place like that somewhere further.  Tasty food,  interesting stock,  prices of course not a Wallmart but affordable . Year after year they going better and better.  One minus is shower policy
Quick stop for a shower 🚿... Cheaper than the major truck stops... Got the job done …

… Spent the night and decided to get a shower. $13 well spent. Modern, roomy and clean. Had.the same tile in the shower stall l have at home. I loved the dual shower heads with the rainfall shower head above you! Felt like home. No soap …

I purchased 117 gallons of fuel and wanted a shower, but was told I had to pay $13.00 because they are an independent truck stop. I don't fuel anywhere but independent truck stops, and with few exceptions they give you a free shower. I know …

I've been coming here for years. I'm sure glad to have a shower. Just wish it was not cold. The restaurant is now under staffed. Poor service and undercooked food. Because of management. Again under staffed! Not  poor staff.

This is my 19th year driving and this was the absolute worst shower experience I've ever had, literally. The shower room like walking in to a sauna at around 105 degrees, no towels, no soap, and I still had to pay 10 dollars after …
It has good food, good quality and good price fuel but they should give free shower after 75 gallons instead 150. People there are very nice.
Showers are big and clean but there's no a/c inside showers and the fan doesn't help with the hot inside, I can't even imagine if I take a shower with hot water, I'll pass out...
